sentences.en: ...a domestic cat.
sentences.cn: …一只家猫。

sentences.en: ...over 100 domestic flights a day to 30 leading U.S. destinations.
sentences.cn: …每天飞往美国30个主要目的地的100多个国内航班。

sentences.en: a domestic cat
sentences.cn: 一只家猫

sentences.en: A special dispensation may be obtained from the domestic union concerned.
sentences.cn: 从国内相关的工会那儿或许能得到一项特许。

sentences.en: As the domestic market becomes saturated, firms begin to export the product.
sentences.cn: 由于国内市场饱和，各公司开始外销。

sentences.en: Because of the slump in domestic demand, production has stopped.
sentences.cn: 由于国内需求大幅下降，生产已经停止。

sentences.en: Domestic chickens are descended from jungle fowl of Southeast Asia.
sentences.cn: 家鸡是由东南亚原鸡演变而来的。

sentences.en: equipment to lighten the load of domestic work
sentences.cn: 减轻家务负担的设备

sentences.en: It appears to be an idyllic domestic set-up.
sentences.cn: 这似乎是一种田园诗般的家庭组成格局。

sentences.en: It was a scene of such domestic bliss.
sentences.cn: 这是一派天伦之乐的场景。

sentences.en: the booming domestic economy
sentences.cn: 迅速增长的国内经济

sentences.en: The Fourth of July domestic culinary pyromania is followed by community pyrotechnics.
sentences.cn: 七月四日,人们在家里食完人间烟火,接下去就是社区的烟花会.

sentences.en: The hijacker comman-deered the plane on a domestic flight.
sentences.cn: 劫机者劫持了这架国内客机。

sentences.en: The house is a textbook example of medieval domestic architecture.
sentences.cn: 这所房子是典型的中世纪民居。

sentences.en: The slowdown in domestic demand was offset by an increase in exports.
sentences.cn: 国内需求放缓和出口增长互相抵消了.

sentences.en: Unfortunately his domestic life wasn’t very happy.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，他的家庭生活并不幸福。

sentences.en: We spent the whole evening discussing domestic trivia.
sentences.cn: 我们整个晚上谈论家庭琐事。

sentences.en: Wild boar readily hybridises with the domestic pig.
sentences.cn: 野猪很容易和家猪杂交。

sentences.en: Women are still the main victims of domestic violence.
sentences.cn: 女性仍然是家庭暴力的主要受害者。

sentences.en: women's liberation from the bondage of domestic life
sentences.cn: 女性从家庭生活束缚中的解脱

国内地；家庭式地；适合国内地
家庭生活；专心于家务；对家庭的挚爱

驯养；使习惯于或喜爱家务和家庭生活

phrases.tran_cn: 国内消费；生活用电量；家庭用水量
国内需求；本地内部需求

trans.tran_cn: 国内的，家用的，喜爱家庭生活的，驯养的
trans.tran_en: relating to or happening in one particular country and not involving any other countries
a servant who works in a large house
